channel.title: SQL From Server To Website
channel.description:
SQL From Server To Website
Hello guys im setting up a new server and i have it running of my home server windows 2008 server. Basically i have my server running and run xammp and using localhost when a player logs out it saves there highscores data to the SQL database correctly. How do i make it so say for example my site runs on the ip 1.1.1.1 and my server on the ip 2.2.2.2 how would i get it so that the site collects the sql data from the server when a player logouts do i need to install anything etc?

item.title: SQL From Server To Website
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

you connect to the database the same way you would if the sql data was stored in europe.

connect, query, display.

the only thing changing is the connection credentials

Read full topic
